sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些连词或副词均含"但是，可是，然而，而"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: but, however, still, yet, nevertheless, while, whereas
means: but ： 口语常用词，语气较强，泛指与前述情况相反。
however ： 表转折关系，语气稍弱于but，连接性也弱一些，因而常作插入语。
still ： 语气强，多用于肯定句或疑问句。指尽管作出让步，采取措施或表示反对，但情况仍然如故，无所改变。
yet ： 常用于否定句，语气比still稍强。指不管作出多大努力或让步，仍达不到预期的结果。
nevertheless ： 指尽管作出完全让步，也不会发生任何影响。
while ： 表对比，一般可与whereas换用，但程度弱一些。
whereas ： 表对比，一般可与while互换。

sentence.Network_en: The opening day of the battle was, nevertheless, accounted a success.
sentence.Network_cn: 不过，开战的首日仍被认为是成功的。

sentence.Network_en: He nevertheless completed the film with breathtaking speed.
sentence.Network_cn: 但他还是以惊人的速度拍完了这部电影。

sentence.Network_en: Our defeat was expected but it is disappointing nevertheless.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们的失败是意料中的事，尽管如此，还是令人失望。

entry.def: You use nevertheless when saying something that contrasts with what has just been said.

example.ex: Most marriages fail after between five and nine years. Nevertheless, people continue to get married.
example.tran: 大部分婚姻在婚后第五至第九年间失败，然而，人们仍会选择结婚。

example.ex: There had been no indication of any loss of mental faculties. His whole life had nevertheless been clouded with a series of illnesses.
example.tran: 没有迹象显示他的智力受到了损害，但是他的一生却是疾病缠身。

means.word_mean: 1. despite anything to the contrary (usually following a concession);

sentences.sentence: "although I'm a little afraid, however I'd like to try it"
"while we disliked each other, nevertheless we agreed"
"he was a stern yet fair master"
"granted that it is dangerous, all the same I still want to go"

stems_affixes.type_exp: 其变体n用在元音前面,表示"不,非"

stems_affixes.word_buile: ne不,非+utral→adj.中立的;中性的,中和的
ne不,非+either[两者]任一的→neither[两者]都不
ne不,非+ever曾经, 永远→永远都不→决不
never决不+the+less无……→具有转折之意:没有决不→然而
ne不,非+either[两者]任一的→neither[两者]都不
never决不+the+less无……→具有转折之意:没有决不→然而

means.word_mean: 仍然, 然而, 不过

sentences.en: What you said was true but nevertheless unkind.
sentences.cn: 你所说的都对, 不过有点不客气。

means.word_mean: 尽管如此, 然而，不过

sentences.en: The news may be unexpected;nevertheless it is true.
sentences.cn: 这消息也许是出乎意料的, 然而是真实的。
